Posts.EditableText:
I'm a long-time user of Quest, dipping into it over the years, but I have only just discovered QuestJS. Where has this been all my life?!

I wanted to thank ThePix for their time and effort in migrating Quest  to straight javascript. I'm excited about this because my one reservation with the original Quest (all credit to Alex aside) was the inability to export to pure JS/HTML/CSS. 

I'm going to have fun bumbling my way through the necessary files to create my game but I noticed there was mention of an editor. I'm assuming this is not available because it is not complete?
Posts.HTML:
I'm a long-time user of Quest, dipping into it over the years, but I have only just discovered QuestJS. Where has this been all my life?!

I wanted to thank ThePix for their time and effort in migrating Quest to straight javascript. I'm excited about this because my one reservation with the original Quest (all credit to Alex aside) was the inability to export to pure JS/HTML/CSS.

I'm going to have fun bumbling my way through the necessary files to create my game but I noticed there was mention of an editor. I'm assuming this is not available because it is not complete?
